channel.title: Zenith base!
channel.description:
Ok so my server is comming along great. but me being a perfectionist. i have to ask.
okay heres what im looking for.
<Player spawns in lummby> goes to goblins to level up. decides to want to go to alkaharid. and goes through gate.
_____________ heres what is happening
<Player spawns in lummby> goes to goblins to level up. decides to want to go to alkaharid. and tries goes through gate. but gate dont work. as it is Null. and nothing interesting happens.
anyone know how i can script objects like this to work?

item.title: Zenith base!
item.dc:creator: @jessessoulmate jessessoulmate
item.description:

Ok so my server is comming along great. but me being a perfectionist. i have to ask.

heres what is happening
